channel.title: Mozilla Firefox
channel.description: For some reason I can't download anything with Firefox anymore. If I click download and save file the download window pops up but nothing is there. I have watched movies that need to be saved by clicking open file but it still doesn't show in the download window. How can I fix this?

item.title: Mozilla Firefox
item.dc:creator: @exps35 exps35
item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

CCleaner is just a more extensive way of clearing your cache and cookies etc.
And it helps clear up the rest of the crap around your system.

What is your computer doing at the time? do you have other things running? Have any RAM / CPU problems?

Read full topic

item.title: Mozilla Firefox
item.dc:creator: @nator123123 nator123123
item.description:
@nator123123 wrote:

either IDK or its in the internet options [cache]

Go check Options on firefox, find anything that has to do with opening pages or links.
And go to Internet Options and find anything that has to do with opening pages or links (can open in Control Panel/Internet Explorer).

Read full topic

item.title: Mozilla Firefox
item.dc:creator: @shpoanator shpoanator
item.description:
@shpoanator wrote:

Yes I have reinstalled it and everything.

Read full topic

item.title: Mozilla Firefox
item.dc:creator: @nator123123 nator123123
item.description:
@nator123123 wrote:

orrrrr…

have you tried reinstalling firefox?

I have a lot of probems like this with firefox, fixes it with just reinstalling it.

Read full topic

item.title: Mozilla Firefox
item.dc:creator: @exps35 exps35
item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

A) too much pron.

B) Download CrapCleaner and delete all of your crap, firefox download history especially.

Maybe its just too full of downloads and it’s slowing down your computer to the point where it just never opens up…

Read full topic
